def_cn: （数字或数量）趋向平缓，趋于稳定
def_en: If a changing number or amount levels off or levels out, it stops increasing or decreasing at such a fast speed.

def_cn: （飞机在爬升或下降后）进入平飞
def_en: If an aircraft levels off or levels out, it travels horizontally after having been travelling in an upwards or downwards direction.
